formattedAddress: 145 Orchard St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 145 Orchard St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
Miracle workers!
Dropped off my wedding dress and they were able to completely alter in one week (major alterations, this wasn’t just a hemming)! Highly recommend and will be back for any of my tailoring needs.

text.text:
Miracle workers!
Dropped off my wedding dress and they were able to completely alter in one week (major alterations, this wasn’t just a hemming)! Highly recommend and will be back for any of my tailoring needs.

originalText.text:
This is THE spot for your tailoring needs! I have a flight tomorrow morning and a last minute take-in for a saree blouse. They took it in this morning and when I came back in the afternoon it was slightly too tight but they let me try it on in their dressing room and adjusted it for me right then and there.

They’re so incredible - I wouldn’t go anywhere else for tailoring!!!

text.text:

originalText.text: Very poor quality alterations. I took a gown here for alterations in a pinch because my regular spot down the street was closed. I had to ask them to expedite my request, which they agreed to do, and my dress was ready when I went to pick it up. While I really appreciate them expediting my request and having my dress ready, I am really unhappy with the very poor quality of the alterations. The hem that they shortened is frayed, the liner is longer than the hem, and they tried to fix a hole in the side of the dress by sewing it together (I didn’t know that was going to be their fix, or I would not have done it) which became puckered and more visible than before (see photos). They actually ruined my dress and I may have to go to another tailor to see if they can fix it, so I’m pretty upset and disappointed about that. I wish they were upfront as most quality tailors would be - if they aren’t able to fix it without messing it up, they shouldn’t to commit to it.

originalText.text: Great pricing, friendly staff, and super quick turn around times. Highly recommend for tailoring or hemming

text.text: Great pricing, friendly staff, and super quick turn around times. Highly recommend for tailoring or hemming

originalText.text:
Fabian and the crew are the best tailors in my experience. They do good work, fast and affordable! Been using them for more than a decade and highly recommend them. I drive two hours just to patronize their business and happy to do so. Always satisfied with their work.

I wrote that two years ago. I now live in Maryland and still let no one else tailor my clothes - I come to NYC to let Fabian do what he alone does best!!! Recently took some jeans and pants to be taken in. Fabian said "Hmm, these are going to be difficult." My response was, "That's why I come to you - you make difficult easy and right!"

#BestTailor
